items.sentence: What would you like to buy Tom for his birthday?
I'd recommend not buying a second-hand computer.
You can't buy a bicycle like this anywhere else.
It's night here, but it's daytime in Boston now.
Are you sure it was yesterday that Tom did that?
Tom has already been asked not to do that again.
I'm looking forward to next week's camping trip.
You should have refused such an unfair proposal.
Your singing puts professional singers to shame.
We'll be studying very hard this time next year.
